original_text: the fourth row shall be topaz, onyx and jasper. Mount them in gold filigree settings.
korean_text: 넷째 줄은 녹보석 호마노 벽옥으로 다 금 테에 물릴지니

sentences.original_text: the fourth row shall be topaz, onyx and jasper
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째 줄은 황옥, 옥수, 벽옥이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Mount them in gold filigree settings
